title: safar1980
author: safar1980
content: Official Website: https://os.dog/OSdog is a system for managing mining on video cards. With its help, you can quickly connect any number of rigs and manage their work: in a couple of clicks, switch between programs and algorithms, manage overclocking, and also see the hash rate, temperature, fan speed, power consumption and other information about the operation of your rigs. The notification system in Telegram can send you regular progress reports or notify you if something went wrong. Welcome!This mining OS has been discussed in other mining forums since 2019https://miningclub.info/threads/osdog-sobaka-os-kto-proboval.58983/Terms of Use:Free 3 rigs in a private group0.25$ for 1 video card per monthThe interface is very similar to Hive OS.All modern miners are addedhttps://os.dog/changelogWho used this OS?
